did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: The California Women in Environmental Design Records 1990-1994
did.abstract: The California Women in Environmental Design (CWED) is a California organization of women professionals that are involved in planning, architecture, landscape architecture, engineering, interior design, and other related fields. The collection contains materials relating to the operations of the organization including newsletters, membership and conference materials, and audiocassettes of sessions at CWED conferences.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the California Women in Environmental Design Architectural Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: The California Women in Environmental Design Records, Ms1990-059, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The California Women in Environmental Design Records were donated to Special Collections in 1990, 2002.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed and encoded by Harvey Clark, July 2010.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The California Women in Environmental Design (CWED) is a California organization of women professionals that are involved in planning, architecture, landscape architecture, engineering, interior design, and other related fields. It was formed as an umbrella organization of the Organization of Women Architects and Design Professionals (OWA).

CWED actively promotes the appointment of women to political positions that shape policy and it tracks and urges passage of legislation that supports responsible design and a better professional life for women. It also works to increase the exposure of design professionals through statewide conferences and exhibitions.
The CWED was formerly known as California Women in Architecture.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains materials relating to the operations of the organization including newsletters, membership flyers, posters, and conference programs and materials. Also present are 37 cassette tapes of sessions at CWED conferences.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the Sigrid Lorenzen Rupp Architectural Collection, Ms1997-006 and the Organization of Women Architects and Design Professionals Ms1988-080.
